MyList.title: Descrption mx grau game
paragraph: 1- MX Grau is a motorbike stunt simulator game,available on both Google Play and the App Store.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxappsltd/MX-Grau/main/5.png
2- It can also be downloaded and played on PC using MEmu ,The game is set in a world of off-road motocross racing.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxappsltd/MX-Grau/main/6.png
3- where players take on the role of a skilled rider and compete in various tournaments.,According to one source, the game teaches players how to MX Grau their bike.

MyList.title: What is the objective of the game
paragraph: 1- The objective of MX Grau is to compete in various tournaments and perform stunts to earn scores and recognition.
2- The game has a realistic physics engine that accurately simulates the movement and behavior of the dirt bikes, making it challenging but also enjoyable.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxappsltd/MX-Grau/main/10.png
3- Players can customize their bikes and riders from a range of options,The game allows players to travel to many locales and hone their riding abilities.
4- PPlayers will be challenged by challenging terrains and obstacles on each of the tracks in this game.

MyList.title: What is the gameplay of MX Grau
paragraph: 1- MX Grau is a motorbike stunt simulator game where players compete in various tournaments and perform stunts to earn scores and recognition.
2- The gameplay involves riding dirt bikes on challenging terrains and obstacles, while performing stunts to earn more scores.
3- The game has a realistic physics engine that accurately simulates the movement and behavior of the dirt bikes, making it challenging but also enjoyable.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxappsltd/MX-Grau/main/8.png
4- Players can customize their bikes and riders from a range of options,Gameplay videos are available on YouTube for those who want to see the game in action.

MyList.title: How many levels are there in MX Grau
paragraph: 1- The number of levels in MX Grau is not specified in the search results. However, one source mentions that the game has challenging levels.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxappsltd/MX-Grau/main/4.png
2- It is likely that the game has multiple levels for players to compete in various tournaments and perform stunts to earn scores and recognition.
3- The game also offers a thrilling racing experience that is packed with fast-paced action.
4- Players can download the game and play it for free on Android devices.
